title: Nvidia's Earnings and Stock Skyrocket — TradingView News
text: Nvidia Corp is projected to report earnings of $4.49 per share for the current quarter, marking a year-over-year change of +410.2%. For the current fiscal year, Nvidia's estimated earnings are $12.30, indicating a change of +268.3% from the previous year. For the upcoming fiscal year, the earnings estimate of $20.07 suggests a change of +63.1% from the previous year's report. In terms of stock performance, Nvidia Corp shares experienced a significant increase of more than 230% in 2023 and have continued to rise since the start of 2024. The company ended 2023 up 239% and has already seen a further increase of 35% in 2024. Nvidia's next earnings announcement is scheduled for February 21, 2024. The company is projected to report net sales of $20.1 billion, up 232.16% from the same period in the previous year. Traders and investors use our platform.
